summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1374, for the improvement of Temple Place, from Washington Street to Main Street; Main Street from Temple Place to Twenty-eight Avenue South; and Twenty-eighth Avenue South from Main Street to Yesler Way, by grading and curbing the same and by constructing concrete walks thereon, under Ordinance No. 15104 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
